solution_line_template: On a regular day it would take {normal_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}=<<{normal_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}={normal_total_time}>>{normal_total_time} minutes
With the leak it will take {leak_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}=<<{leak_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}={leak_total_time}>>{leak_total_time} minutes
It will take {leak_total_time}-{normal_total_time}=<<{leak_total_time}-{normal_total_time}={extra_time}>>{extra_time} more minutes if the leak goes undetected
